entries.name: Ultra-Clear Value Hero

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Trust-building dominates; CTA appears natural, not forced

entries.content_notes: Headline should answer 'What do you offer?' immediately. Keep subheadline under 180 characters. Use warm, empowering language.
entries.placement_recommendation: Homepage hero, landing pages, campaign entry points

entries.name: Still-Life Confidence Hero

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Build confidence through aesthetics before asking for action

entries.content_notes: Use still-life images: tea settings, plants, soft textiles, natural light. Avoid clinical or body imagery.
entries.placement_recommendation: Alternative homepage hero, about page, service landing pages

entries.name: Outcome-Based Help (Ich m√∂chte...)

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: 70/30 split - interface responds to attention rather than directing it

entries.content_notes: Use 4-8 options. Frame as outcomes, not services. Include icon, label, description per option.
entries.placement_recommendation: Homepage below hero, help center, navigation enhancement

entries.name: Self-Serve Solution Hub

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Adapt based on user behavior - explorers vs. seekers

entries.content_notes: Include search, category filters, solution cards, quick shortcuts, and FAQs. Provide empty state with suggestions.
entries.placement_recommendation: Resources page, help center, knowledge base

entries.name: Mission Narrative Panel

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Story-first approach - pushing only after trust established

entries.content_notes: Use editorial typography. Include mission statement, narrative body, values grid, and optional team imagery.
entries.placement_recommendation: About page, mission page, footer expanded section

entries.name: Inline Contextual Help
entries.content_notes: Three types: tooltip (brief), popover (detailed), inline-expandable (in-flow). Use supportive, non-clinical tone. Include keyboard support.
entries.placement_recommendation: Forms, terminology, complex processes, feature explanations

entries.name: Trust-Wall

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Trust must feel earned, not sold - curate don't dump

entries.content_notes: Include testimonial cards, certification badges, partner logos (grayscale), and calm statistics. Keep numbers non-aggressive.
entries.placement_recommendation: Homepage section, pricing page, checkout sidebar

entries.name: Brand Progress Timeline

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Story momentum leads naturally to action at end

entries.content_notes: Include 6-10 milestones. Distinguish past (solid) from future (dashed). Use scroll-triggered animation with reduced motion support.
entries.placement_recommendation: About page, history section, investor page

entries.name: Transparent Step-List Onboarding

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Shift from transparency-dominant to momentum-dominant as user progresses

entries.content_notes: Show all steps from start. Include time estimates, back navigation, and progress percentage. Use calm completion celebrations.

entries.name: Magazine-Editorial Layout
entries.content_notes: Use drop caps, pull quotes, sidebars, and inline images. Serif typography for warmth. Include byline with author info and reading time.
entries.placement_recommendation: Blog posts, resources, guides, educational content

entries.name: Lightning Booking (Fast Flow)

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Efficiency-first: every element serves the 15-second booking goal

entries.content_notes: Minimal course cards with essential info only. Single-page inline form. Calendar export on confirmation. Target: 15-second completion.
entries.placement_recommendation: Quick booking pages, returning user flows, mobile-first experiences

entries.name: Course Discovery (Exploration)

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Journey-first: the exploration IS the value, booking is natural conclusion

entries.content_notes: Visual cards with instructor avatars. Multi-step form with goals field. Celebration confirmation. Related courses carousel.
entries.placement_recommendation: Marketing landing pages, content discovery, first-time visitor paths

entries.name: Smart Booking (Balanced)

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Progressive disclosure lets users self-select their depth

entries.content_notes: Two-panel layout with sliding sidebar. Accordion for details. Modal confirmation. Serves both quick bookers and explorers.
entries.placement_recommendation: Main course catalog, general booking flows, default booking experience

entries.name: Expert Advisor Booking

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Data transparency enables confident decisions; tools support bulk booking

entries.content_notes: Filter bar with dropdowns. List-view layout. Comparison mode. Multi-step form with billing. Invoice generation. WCAG AAA.
entries.placement_recommendation: Corporate booking portal, HR training catalog, enterprise solutions

entries.name: Guided First Booking (Onboarding)

dual_inclusion.blend_strategy: Anxiety reduction through guidance; celebration rewards commitment

entries.content_notes: Welcome section with 3-step guide. Visual cards with badges. Multi-step form with hints. Confetti celebration. Clear next steps.
entries.placement_recommendation: First-time user flows, onboarding sequences, anxiety-sensitive contexts
